author: jwkaltz
msg: Removed hard-coding of ou=People branch, added possibility to search a
subtree for a user, and added option to support MS Active Directory

author: jwkaltz
msg: A sample for ldap.properties; the usage of the various options
(especially the new ones) are documented within the file

author: rgardler
msg: input plugins use the name input.xmap rather than sitemap.xmap

author: trustin
msg: Fixed: UDPOutputManager.write(ClientKey, ByteBuffer[]) doesn't flip the merged ByteBuffer nor send any data out.
Added: GatheringOutputEvent.getBuffer() for possible later use
